meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a tone or tones.
meanings.sent1: The tonemic quality of the music filled the room with a soothing atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Her tonemic voice was perfect for the calming lullaby she sang.
meanings.sent3: The tonemic sound of the wind chimes made the birds dance in delight.
meanings.sent4: His tonemic laughter echoed through the halls, bringing joy to all who heard.
meanings.sent5: The tonemic melody of the piano resonated in her heart long after the song ended.
